description: Number of steps needed for juggler sequence (A094683) started at n to reach 1.
comments: It is not known if every starting value eventually reaches 1.
references: C. Pickover, Computers and the Imagination, St. Martin's Press, NY, 1991, p. 232.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Juggler Sequence
maple: A007320 := proc(n)    local a,ntrack;    a := 0 ;    ntrack := n ;    while ntrack > 1 do        ntrack := A094683(ntrack) ;        a := a+1 ;    end do:    return a;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 19 2013
mathematica: js[n_] := If[ EvenQ[n], Floor[ Sqrt[n]], Floor[ Sqrt[n^3]]]; f[n_] := Length[ NestWhileList[js, n, # != 1 &]] - 1; Table[ f[n], {n, 99}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 10 2004 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Robert G. Wilson v_, _Mira Bernstein_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Jason Earls, Jun 09 2004
